ygData.subject: Armor choices, what is best?
ygData.msgSnippet: IMO, dex is worthless for a SK less ya got some sorta procing weapon...Go AC first, then STR, then agility..  Personally, Dex to me is not
ygData.messageBody:
<snip>
IMO, dex is worthless for a SK less ya got some sorta procing weapon...Go AC
first, then STR, then agility..
<snip>

Personally, Dex to me is not worthless. Anything that allows me to strike
even one more time each minute is worth it. Especially with Double Attack.
But that is symantics and I do not want a "word war" over it. :-)
I agree that raw AC comes first. Strength has more impact after 20. Agility
is up in the air for me. Not quite sure what effect it has.


What armor under Darkforge and Planes armor is best for an SK? I am working
on getting some bronze armor, and not blackened because of the lower AC.
What is better than bronze and what would I expect to pay for it? Or what
MoB/level/zone is it in.
I am ignorant as to "good" items as I normally wander Norrath with my /ooc,
/auction, /shouts turned off. It is quite peaceful like this, no punk
kiddies acting tough and cursing each other out across the zone. But I
digress.

My druid just hit 26 and I am looking into getting equipment for my SK. All
I need is to be pointed in the right direction. Any and all help is
appreciated.

Thanks in advance.

--
Lasombra Shadowfiend
1st Tier of Hate
(Sitting on the newbie repop log with my newbie equip, staring at the murky
forrest)
